subject: Order number SSN3211
description_text:
Any way to cancel this order? I didn't know the haptic motors were going to
come with the extra plate.


Thanks
Piero Ramos

conversations.body_text: Hi Piero Ramos,    We regret to inform you that your package has already been shipped and we are unable to cancel it for you. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
